Question 5
  Found [build] with compatible type.
  Failure: [build] is incorrect.
    The following expression:
    
     | build [(false, 1); (false, 1)]
    raises the following exception: [InputIsTooShort(2)] This is invalid.
    Producing the following result is valid: [Fork (Leaf (false), Leaf
    (false))]
